Name: Essence of Illumination: The Beginning
About the game: In this first episode is a mystical immersive adventure that this relaxing, mesmerizing, and an exciting underwater experience as you explore an ancient world of a lost civilization with a Goddess whoâ€™s light and magic gives you the Power of Light to cleanse the dark matter that destroyed the civilization long ago. With the help of the Temple Guardian, you unlock the hidden gate through an ancient artifact. The highly detailed environment creates a wonderful sense of immersion, and this experience is suitable for the whole family and brings a sense of true exploration. Nothing is inappropriate or too scary for younger players or the more mature. This is just the beginning of the journey, with more exciting episodes in development.
